material_changes.name: Flutter Entertainment
material_changes.search_query: Flutter Entertainment FLUT stock drops November 13, 2025

news.search_query: Flutter Entertainment FLUT stock drops November 13, 2025
news.summary: Flutter Entertainment fell -8.8% on November 13 following Q3 2025 earnings despite EPS of $1.64 crushing estimates of $0.59. Management cut 2025 adjusted EBITDA outlook by $280M (customer-friendly NFL outcomes in Sept-Oct hurt sportsbook). Announced $200-300M investment in FanDuel Predicts prediction market for 2026. Eight analysts slashed price targets post-earnings.

material_changes.name: Bally's Corporation
material_changes.search_query: Bally's Corporation BALY stock rises December 16, 2025

news.search_query: Bally's Corporation BALY stock up December 16, 2025
news.summary: Bally's Corporation (BALY) stock rose 6.7% to close at $17.08 on December 16, 2025, following news that the company secured up to $1.1 billion in term loans through an amended and restated commitment letter. The financing development provided investor confidence in the casino and gaming company's liquidity position and ability to fund ongoing development projects. The gain contributed to BALY's year-to-date return of 7.53% as of the close.

material_changes.name: Bally's Corporation
material_changes.search_query: Bally's Corporation BALY stock rises December 17, 2025

news.search_query: Bally's Corporation BALY stock up December 17, 2025
news.summary: Bally's Corporation (BALY) stock rose 5.8% on December 17, 2025, to close at $16.40, driven by the company's announcement that it secured up to $1.1 billion in term loans through an amended and restated commitment letter. The financing development provided investors with increased confidence in the gaming company's liquidity position and ability to fund its operations and expansion plans. The stock movement came amid broader corporate restructuring efforts, including a recent rollover election period for stockholders that concluded in January 2025.
